column1: According to police, incidents of mobile phone snatching, robberies and motorcycle/car snatching has fallen in the category of street crime. In 2022, around 85,000 cases, while 21,544 such cases were reported during the current year till March 31.While 34 innocent citizens were killed by muggers over resistance in the metropolis during the first three months, the Karachi police claimed to have killed over a dozen criminals in encounters and arrested over 650.Thousands of people have been deprived of either their cell phone or their motorcycle in the metropolis during the current year. Most of them reported the incident to police, but there are several incidents that have gone unreported..
